name: Twit Ya !
tag_list: twitter, client, ajax, celebrities, directory, social, interaction
overview:
Twit Ya! offers users a fuller picture of any given Twitter user. This includes seeing a user’s:

  • status updates
  • recent friends, their profile information and their most recent update
  • search mentions

Added features include:

  • links to multiple stats sites for any given user
  • search a user’s updates
  • see a user’s incoming messages
  • reply and retweet their updates via twitter.com
  • search all of twitter
  • large celebrity finder and business directory

Benefits:

  • twitter profile surfing becomes fun, fast and easy
  • over 400 authenticated celebrities and businesses
  • kick off relationships by replying or retweeting your newest friends’ updates
  • shows who celebrities are following and makes it easy to subscribe
  • ajax-driven, client-side interface, no page reloads, no login
  • get involved with twitter without requiring an account
  • good as a personal destination: http://twitya.com/#username
  • compelling adjunct to twitter.com

milestones.description: Partnering with http://hackerbra.in - smart and fast Hacker News. Popup user profiles with @ usernames are now linked to Twitya.

external_links.title: Twit Ya! - A different approach to twitter profile views
